Unicron/Sun Crusher:




Unicron looked to Hell Beast and nodded at his words, but did not return the 
salute.  He was not in th Empire.
"I am donating this base to your cause, but I require a favor in return."

The ancient being walked over to a computer terminal, typing in a few things 
and a holographic map displayed the wreckage of the Newcomer base.
"I need raw materials from this destroyed base.  I don't need that much, and 
the rest will be given to you.  I'd prefer having them salvaged as quickly as 
possible.  Then I will begin giving you all the access codes to the Ramora 
for the Neo Decepticon Empire's permanent stay."
